synopsis.text: Short animation by Kaori Iwase, "Golden Dreams" takes us on a nostalgic journey with an elderly woman and her cherished goldfish. As she slips into a dreamlike state, we are transported back in time to her childhood, where a significant event ignited her lifelong passion for these shimmering creatures. Prepare to be swept away by this touching tale that explores the enduring bond between a person and their beloved pet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
